title: Raw T206 FS -- downsizing the Monster (LETTER B - PRICES REDUCED)
author: trdcrdkid

posts.post_title: Raw T206 FS -- downsizing the Monster (LETTER B - PRICES REDUCED)
posts.post_content:
In the first thread of this series, I mentioned how, after achieving a Monster Number of over 500, I've decided to downsize my T206 collection to focus on tough backs (of which I have many), Cubs and White Sox (of which I have both team sets), top-tier HOFers, and a few nice cards that I just like. I'm selling the rest, starting with the letter A in that first post:

[url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=285881[/url]

I posted cards starting with B here the other day. Now I'm reducing the prices on the cards that remain, and adding new cards starting with letter C in a new post. Prices are listed after each picture, PayPal F&F preferred. PM me if interested. Please add $3 for shipping for any number of cards up to $100, after which shipping is free.

[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/50156827188_4131f9167d_b.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/50157382561_5a00847035_b.jpg[/IMG]

Barbeau 25
